channel.title: 508 Hd Fullscreen Webclient Help. Not noobie
channel.description:
I have been reading on how to make 508 hd into a webclient and have gone through the whole process. After a while I have been able to get the client into the browser. Now it will load everything until it gets to Connecting to update server... Then gives me the js5error connect. I checked my cmd from the server and my connection request was sent and recieved. It however is not allowing the client to log in or something. (it is the client I always use with my server) Could some1 please explain. Here is my html file ripped from another tut on this site. [code]</FORM>
<center><applet name=RuneScape id=game width=765 height=503 archive='Webclient.jar' code='client.class' mayscript>
<param name=worldid value=41> <param name=members value=1> <param name=modewhat value=0> <param name=modewhere value=0> <param name=safemode value=0> <param name=lang value=0> <param name=affid value=0> <param name=settings value=kKmok3kJqOeN6D3mDdihco3oPeYN2KFy6W5--vZUbNA> <param name=cookieprefix value=> <param name=cookiehost value=.google.com> <param name=plug value=0> <param name=js value=1> <param name=game value=0>
</applet> <center>[/code]

item.title: 508 Hd Fullscreen Webclient Help. Not noobie
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

halolouis:

Does an Aplet have to be signed in order to make an outbound connection or something?

no.
go to youtube search for jarring and signing

Read full topic
